website_summaries.verdict: A stylish tote for the fashion conscious that's perfect for the beach or running errands.
pros: Available in 3 rich color choices including red, purple, and turquoise
There are a total of 8 pockets and one roomy compartment
The bag also has a charging port and is machine washable
cons: Not suitable as a family beach bag and no top zipper

customer_reviews.title: Took along time to find the right bag
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable strap that lets bag be secure against body allowing hands free movement.Zipper closure adds extra security.Good amount of pockets to organize with room to add larger bulk articles.Washable makes it better then leather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag .. very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Very comfortable on shoulders, despite having a lot of heavy books in it.
customer_reviews.author: NicoBella

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I must return it because it is too large for me. I bought it for a commuter bag. My main required feature of a commuter bag is it must have 3 outside pockets. The slide pockets inside are huge and there are many. I got the gray color and it is beautiful, really a blue gray or a light slate. The pictures show it standing up so I was surprised it came folded flat. The bottom stitching is sturdy, so maybe it would flatten over time and stand without puddling. Very nice, well made, just bigger than I need.
customer_reviews.author: AZKP

customer_reviews.title: Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! I bought this for a weekend at the beach. It fit all of my clothes, makeup, and toiletries! I just had to bring a second bag for towels. Since then, I've used this bag for various weekend trips as well as used it for work. It easily fits my laptop, iPad, various chargers, pens, and plenty of folders/notebooks. I think this bag is a little too big to use as a purse unfortunately but its so useful for so many other things!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Aiken

customer_reviews.title: I've always loved Vera Bradley purses
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved Vera Bradley purses. I'm not a fan of the newer prints so I decided to try this black one out. Just because it's black doesn't mean its plain! I love this bag. I use it as a purse.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Helm

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BAG
customer_reviews.text: Okay, let me start by saying that I was never a Vera Bradley fan. I always hated the patterns and thought they were so overrated. But then I found this solid black one and I LOVE IT! I'm a teacher so I was looking for a bag that had enough room without looking being the size of a suitcase and was mashine washable. You'd be surprised how many bag are not machine washable and with COVID, I am not taking hat risk. It has so many pockets on the inside for all my things and I still have space inside. It's practical, cute, and, while the price point is higher than I'd normally purchase, I think it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Black Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best teacher bag ever! Not too big not too smal!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of Vera Bradley purses. I have several and use them all the time. I really like this particular tote. It is large, but not too big. I can carry my iPad and a bottle or two of water! Easy to find what I am looking for inside...everything has enough room and is easily accessed. I wash all my Vera Bradley’s in the washing machine on a gentle cycle. I reform them and let them air dry on the top of my dryer. They look brand new again. A nice, attractive, quality product!
customer_reviews.author: GLD

customer_reviews.title: Nice for work
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile, lightweight, roomy tote bag. This bag is my go to for everyday work and other activities. I can fit a whole lot in here and the bag doesn’t get too heavy until I add quite a few large and heavy objects. Can hold my MacBook Pro, but does not have a separate, padded department for a laptop. I love the pockets inside. I’m not a huge fan of the Vera Bradley patterns, but this black back is understated.
customer_reviews.author: Bookwyrm

customer_reviews.title: A large but lightweight bag.
customer_reviews.text: Like all Vera Bradly products, this bag is high quality and relatively light weight for its generous size. It has both outside and inside pockets which make it a breeze to organize your things. This leaves the center available for a book, tablet, newspaper or even your change of clothes for an overnight stay. With a top zipper, your belongings are safe while walking around the big city.
customer_reviews.author: Amo46

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this bag! I wanted a big bag to haul all my work stuff around (laptop, iPad, notebook, wallet, keys, etc) and landed on this one. I went bold and bought the red one and it’s great. Well constructed, I love all the pockets, and it’s really big without looking bulky. I use it daily and even used it on an overnight trip when I couldn’t find my suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: KimD

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: I have several Vera Bradley bags, love them all. This is my first microfiber one, black. Love the big pockets on the inside and outside pocket for my phone. This bag seems lighter than my others, my old back and arms said thank you, very well made.
customer_reviews.author: A fan

customer_reviews.title: One of Vera Bradleys best bags!
customer_reviews.text: This bag will not disappoint! It is absolutely perfect for my marketing and sales work day! Several interior pockets, and an exterior pocket, A hidden key pocket, extremely durable material, and handles that can take the weight, including your laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Todoroff

customer_reviews.title: True Vera Bradley. Amazing quality & large!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. Large enough to hold a huge laptop, laptop charger, and other papers/accessories. I even use it as an overnight bag sometimes. Beautiful design inside, as well! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MiMi to 4

customer_reviews.title: Quality, size, appearance
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tote that can be used with other patterns of VB. This tote accentuates the carry on and large weekender luggage I already have. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: AnnMarie63

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for work
customer_reviews.text: I teach in a high school and i have to travel between classrooms. I needed a bag to hold my laptop, papers, and my personal items when going between classrooms. This was such a great buy. Great quality and the perfect size. Holds my laptop and whatever else I need. The pockets are great for smaller items like my phone and chapstick. Perfect for work.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Vera Bradley Vera Tote in Solid Black
customer_reviews.text: I love Vera Bradley products, so when I see something at a great price, I don't hesitate to buy it. This bag is $99 in the store, and I was able to get it for under $50. That's some savings! The seller was fantastic. The bag arrived before it was even due. It's beautiful, and the perfect size for work or a weekend get away. The only thing that I like better on the patterned bags are the straps. These aren't as comfortable, but I would definitely say don't hesitate to buy this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beach tote
customer_reviews.text: Saw this tote on the beach a couple of weeks ago and fell in love with it. Started a search for it and found it right away on Amazon. My current Beach tote was much too large and kept collecting unnecessary items making it very heavy to drag down to the water's edge. This one is the perfect size and fits everything that I need and nothing that I don't. The color is gorgeous yes.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A. Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Large!
customer_reviews.text: Its a great bag but huge! Unfortunately returned the item but it would be perfect for someone who has more crap in their purse, than I do.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie D. Padilla-Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this tote! Plenty of room, and lots of pockets! It's the perfect size, sturdy, and well made. So happy I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Cobygirl517

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my purposes.
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag for my music supplies when I go to rehearsals. It's perfect for my music, water, cell phone, sweater, and anything else I need to bring. I love all the pockets!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Berry

customer_reviews.title: Love Vera Bradley Tote
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this beautiful black bag. Spacious, durable and easy to carry in my travels locally and around the country.. Love, love, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Washer

customer_reviews.title: Navy Tote
customer_reviews.text: The navy color is really nice. I wanted an almost black bag with a blue hint and that’s exactly what the color turned out to be. The bag is slightly bigger than I’d like it to be but as a working mother I can use this bag to carry my laptop to work as well as a diaper bag during the weekends. It’s a versatile bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Toting away with my VB tote!
customer_reviews.text: This tote is great! So spacious and can hold a lot. Made out of very good material and got this at a very good price. Love the matching zip around wallet as well. Two great buys! The inside colors are great as well and won't show a stain if you get one from something. Also since its fabric it's a whole lot easier to clean with just a wet nap or make up wipe. Super sturdy and can foresee myself using this product for a long while.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag! I’m a nurse and tote this thing around to work everyday. Very sturdy, comfortable and sleek. Many pockets available for odds and ends things. Great quality so I know if will hold up for quite some time!
customer_reviews.author: S & S Denner

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant color. Nice size. Lots of pockets. Lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: l thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size bag. Not to big and not to small.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Perfect and just what I needed! Lots of pockets! Zips up! Cell phone pocket or keys.
customer_reviews.author: buying 2 much on amazon

customer_reviews.title: Lovely bag, glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, stylish, and just the size I was looking for to carry some work papers home along with my lunch. It's not my primary purse, but definitely something I can use to run errands on the weekends. I also love the bold color.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Love This Tote
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to hold all of my necessities for an overnight hospital visit. Really like that the bag is structured without being super stiff. I have a purse in matching fabric which makes for a polished appearance when traveling, etc.
customer_reviews.author: C Gear

customer_reviews.title: ... to big for what I needed but still a great bag.
customer_reviews.text: It was to big for what I needed but still a great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Bryanna

customer_reviews.title: Love this purse❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love that this purse is lightweight. I use it all the time!!
customer_reviews.author: The Digital Imager

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: Just did not look like the finer quality of other VB bags I have bought....and I have more than 20. Did not like the fabric texture or the finishing touches. Much too large for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Muller

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Mom but she is happy with it. I have two that are similar and I like the type of straps and the zipper closure added to this style.
customer_reviews.author: BigRed

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are awesome! They last a long time and put up with me carting around a mini library everyday. Worth the money. And the color is better in person than on screen.
customer_reviews.author: LAURA AMUNDSON

customer_reviews.title: RETURN
customer_reviews.text: I’m trying to return this and I am requesting an actual label to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Marisha Everett

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It"s big but I can be organized
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It"s big but I can be organized. I was concerned that without a zipper it would fall over & things would fall out. I got to test that when I had to brake unexpectedly in traffic, my bag fell to the floorboards & nothing fell out!
customer_reviews.author: jdq

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect I use it for work there are more then enough pockets and room for everything I need plus its beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Ray Morrison

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I love the red color
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I love the red color. It's so pretty and happy. I love the back zip pocket and the front and the inside pockets. My bigger 6s phone fits perfectly in the front pocket. It stays organized and I know where everything is. It is a little on the big side but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mountaineer

customer_reviews.title: You get your money’s worth
customer_reviews.text: Love the size , I live all my Vera Bradley bags
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Zipprich

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tango Red, Bera Bradley Tote Bag
customer_reviews.text: This Tango Red, Vera Bradley Tote Bag is beautiful. The red is true red. I like Vera Bradley bags and this one is a favorite. I highly recommend this tote bag. The size is roomy, with pockets inside. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Measurements misleading
customer_reviews.text: The measurements should have listed the width of bag it is 171/2. I was looking for the smaller version12.5 high and 13 wide which have now. I thought was close to these measurements listed on your page. It is a beautiful bag but was looking for more a pocketbook smaller version. • 11" shoulder drop • 14" high • 14.5"
customer_reviews.author: jacob c. head

customer_reviews.title: It is,a well made item.
customer_reviews.text: The color sold me first! Love the turquoise! And since it is a Vera Bradley item, I knew the quality would be good.
customer_reviews.author: V. Alley

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It was beautiful ... just a little too big for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large tote
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big! What’s not to love. Too large for a purse, though. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: lunchlady

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for work (teaching) everyday. Great buy. All black is perfect. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MMc76

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for traveling. This bag was a gift and she loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: DRG girl

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: I love Vera Bradley bags and I love the solid black design. I use this bag for days that I have a little more to carry with me than usual (e.g., laptop, textbook, lunch, water). This bag is also great for weekend trips and fits perfectly under an airplane seat.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M Titterington

customer_reviews.title: Vera
customer_reviews.text: It's Vera what can you say. They changed the button to a metal toggle but it is cushiony. I'm glad I bought this one and not the new version.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie G

customer_reviews.title: Great Everyday Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great everyday bag. My only complaint is that I lose everything at the bottom, which is typical with big bags.
customer_reviews.author: A SaramaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love it. The color is great
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The color is great. Great functionality and organization. And the price was right!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Send a snail mail to my home postbox no computer or printer
customer_reviews.text: Dislike the size and quality I’m desperate to return by a label snail mail.. at this time no computer bot printer
customer_reviews.author: ann-marie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but well made!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Love the hidden phone pocket. Lightweight too and that is what I needed. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tote
customer_reviews.text: Super Big tote, almost too big as a purse but wonderful as a carry all tote bag.
customer_reviews.author: Moni

customer_reviews.title: Very classic looking!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color (hawthorne rose), the microfiber, 6 inside pockets, outside zipper pocket. It is perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Boop

customer_reviews.title: Great tote
customer_reviews.text: It is a very pretty bag - it is a good size
customer_reviews.author: cole612

customer_reviews.title: Nice but too large
customer_reviews.text: Nicely done but too large. The smaller bags are not solid color.
customer_reviews.author: flyer2b

customer_reviews.title: II worked great as as carry on luggage for my
customer_reviews.text: was much bigger than i expected with the zip closer on top it huge at the top. II worked great as as carry on luggage for my trip
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: The tote was very well made. It's very versatile and the color choices were awesome. Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: i love vera bradley and love this print
customer_reviews.text: ordered for a work bag. i love vera bradley and love this print! great size too
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice purse. Straps are a good length
customer_reviews.text: Nice purse. Straps are a good length. It's bigger than I thought it would be but I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Aprilleigh

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this tote going by the dimensions given: ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tote going by the dimensions given: 14 x 14 with an 11inch strap - instead, it is huge.... I will probably return it, I just wanted a roomy tote - not an overnight bag!
customer_reviews.author: MarilynLButler

customer_reviews.title: Bera bradley tango bag
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than the picture but good deal i can fit allot of things inside love the color
customer_reviews.author: CARMEN CORTES

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: A great size-holds water bottle, tablets, notebooks-whatever I want to carry. I love the black microfiber-goes with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Book fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Great Tote
customer_reviews.text: This my 3rd Classic Black tote. Obviously I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Coo-y-yah

customer_reviews.title: Bag nice, straps not so
customer_reviews.text: just ok, due to the straps. These are too stiff. I wished they were soft material, like all the other VB bags
customer_reviews.author: Napagal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful workhorse
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, enough storage for whatever my day needs yet looks professional.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lugar

customer_reviews.title: Strong Tote Bag
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about my new tote including the pockets and interior design.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Dillard

customer_reviews.title: ... black is difficult to find & I was so pleased to find it on amazon & at a great ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag in black is difficult to find & I was so pleased to find it on amazon & at a great price. This was a gift for my mom & she's so happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Cordeiro

customer_reviews.title: The bag is fine but the straps are hard and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The bag is fine but the straps are hard and uncomfortable. I'm returning it. It would be better if it had a purely fabric straps.
customer_reviews.author: Tran L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: This bag is the perfect size for travelling - big enough but not so big that it weighs on your shoulder. The basic black is very classy.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Bergen

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It's perfect for school and work and has plenty of room!! I would def buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Book nerd

customer_reviews.title: but awesome product otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Just wish it had a zipper... but awesome product otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Mercy Njuguna

customer_reviews.title: Too big and bulky!
customer_reviews.text: I love Vera Bradley, but this bag was uncomfortable to hold and too bulky. The inside pockets are the whole length of the bag...this is just too deep. Everything falls to the bottom of the pocket and you have to search for it. It shouldn't be so much wider at the top than the bottom. I guess I just need it to be a little smaller with pockets I can actually use. The material is great and light as ever, just wish a little smaller and adjustments to the pockets, then it would be great!
customer_reviews.author: fusion7

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wife gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for the wife and she loves it. She wanted an alternative to a purse & diaper bag and this bag fits everything she needs. Quality is excellent and made wife happy so that gets 5 stars any day.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: All Vera Bradley totes are wonderful. So roomy and wonderful pockets inside
customer_reviews.text: All Vera Bradley totes are wonderful. So roomy and wonderful pockets inside. This is my 3rd bag and I love the black quilting. Stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Horst

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my daughter as a graduation gift. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Paula_Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Go ECU Pirates!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect East Carolina University Color! Pirate purple and gold ae our colors. Know you call it Elderberry but it is the perfect color for our school. Going to see if i can have a gold monogram done on it. Either ECU or Pirates. Have another Vera Bradley bag and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Briley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This BAG! I love it! Everything I needed for teaching 😊 I hope it lasts me awhile!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Vera Bradley Women's Microfiber Vera Tote Bag
product_meta.description:
Microfiber is lightweight, solid-colored polyester. Exterior features a front slip pocket, a zip pocket and a hidden top pocket. Interior features 6 slip pockets. Zip closure. Close all zippers before laundering. Machine wash cold gentle cycle. Use non-chlorine bleach as needed, line dry.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :6.25 x 19.25 x 14.75 inches; 1.13 Pounds
 * Item model number :18576-D52
 * Department :Women's
 * Date First Available :January 16, 2017
 * Manufacturer :Vera Bradley
 * ASIN :B01MRUC1H6

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #103,167 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #47318 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #389 inWomen's Tote Handbags 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars219 ratings Microfiber is lightweight, solid-colored polyester. Exterior features a front slip pocket, a zip pocket and a hidden top pocket. Interior features 6 slip pockets. Zip closure. Close all zippers before laundering. Machine wash cold gentle cycle. Use non-chlorine bleach as needed, line dry.
feature_bullets: MACHINE WASHABLE MICROFIBER -- Made from sleek & lightweight microfiber, these solid colors bring style & function to your everyday life

EVERYDAY USE -- Vera Bradley tote bags are perfect for any occasion - whether you are heading to work, on a weekend getaway, going to a party, or traveling, they are your perfect daily companion - & make great gifts too

PACK IN STYLE -- With printed polyester lining & 6 slip interior pockets, keep your daily commute thoroughly organized with style all over - toss in your lipstick & laptop & keep your protein bars separate from your pens

ESSENTIALS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS -- The exterior features a front slip pocket, a zip pocket, & a hidden top pocket - ideal for storing your wallet, phone, reading material or snacks that are quick to access but out of sight - With a 12 inch strap drop, you can grab the dual straps on the go or throw over your shoulder to rest comfortably

STYLISH, LIGHTWEIGHT & SIZED RIGHT -- The Vera Tote measures 15 inches high, 15 inches wide, & 6 inches deep - the perfect combination of business & pleasure to take you from the commute to the office to drinks downtown
